markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Velstrac Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2456) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 63 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Shackleborn](/Feats.aspx?ID=2451)

</column>

---

You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chains—but whips and chains also have their place. You can cast [_telekinetic maneuver_](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) and [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells; in both cases, the spells manifest shadowy chains rather than their usual visual signifiers.
name: Velstrac Magic
